attributes.action: locate the new Trident near his own home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the residents of Glasgow have the prospect of being "target city no. 1" should WW3 start, when it is decisions made in London that may cause it. How popular would nuclear weapons be if they were located near the politicians who voted for it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
